data.title: Food Security: The Science, Sociology and Economics of Food Production and Access to Food, Springer & The International Society for Plant Pathology
data.text:
Corrections

All material on this site has been provided by the respective publishers and authors. You can help correct errors and omissions. When requesting a correction, please mention this item's handle: RePEc:spr:ssefpa. See general information about how to correct material in RePEc.
